text:
YU Lounge and Four Seasons Resort Nevis Partner to Deliver complete, sea,less and personalised arrival and departure experience
Stepping into luxury straight from the plane is now possible through a new strategic partnership between the YU Lounge and Four Seasons Resort Nevis. Guests can choose the YU Lounge experience to bookend their Four Seasons Resort Nevis stay for a personalised, stylish and stress-free arrival and departure experience at St. Kitts Airport. Further, coupling the YU Lounge experience with the private Four Seasons launch service between St. Kitts and the Resort’s private on-property pier, guests will enjoy a complete, seamless and incredibly scenic airport-and-Resort connection. Four Seasons Resort Nevis guests can immediately take advantage of exclusive courtesy rates as part of the new partnership to experience the private luxury airport lounge.
“Our guests can begin an extraordinary experience as soon as they step off the plane,” says Ed Gannon, General Manager of Four Seasons Resort Nevis. “With our new YU Lounge relationship, Four Seasons Resort Nevis guests can enjoy personalised service and unprecedented convenience from the jet way to the fairways. We’re very glad to partner with the YU Lounge to further elevate the guest experience between St. Kitts Airport and Four Seasons Resort Nevis. ”
“We are extremely honoured that the quality of our infrastructure and the level of our services have been acknowledged by a great leader in the hospitality industry, Four Seasons Hotels and Resorts. This encourages us to go further and higher,” say Nirvan Veerasamy and Uday Nayak, co-founders of the Veling Group, owner of the YU Lounge.
Identified as a likeminded luxury partner, the YU Lounge is a private airport terminal with a refined environment and equipped to deliver personalised five-star service and a range of aircraft handling services. The YU Lounge redefines luxury for guests arriving and/or departing by either private or commercial jet. The moment the guests step off the plane, they will be whisked away to the stylish lounge in a luxury vehicle. Once inside, they can simply relax and enjoy the culinary delicacies created by the YU Lounge’s own chef while they sip on a glass of champagne or their favourite drink. Their luggage, along with the customs and immigration, will be taken care of by the YU Lounge team. Further, the plush YU Lounge interior features flat-screen TVs, computers for complimentary use, free wifi and a variety of magazines to read in one of the cosy seating areas. Once the formalities are complete, guests will board to transfer to Port Zante to embark on the private Four Seasons launch.
Aboard the private Four Seasons launch, guests can enjoy complimentary local beers, fruit punch and signature Four Seasons rum punch amid a scenic 40-minute crossing to the Resort’s private, on-property dock in Nevis. Guests will be welcomed on the pier and escorted to their rooms where their luggage will be waiting.
Source:- Four Seasons Resort
